entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character of the story, a student at Hogwarts School. He is mentioned as leaving Professor's office and then running in the corridor.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Harry's friend, also a student at Hogwarts. He is described as disheveled and fast asleep when Harry gets back to the dormitory.

entities.name: professor
entities.description: A teacher at Hogwarts School, mentioned as having an office where Harry visits her.

relationships.description: Harry visited Professor's office and had a conversation with her.
Harry met Ron in the common room, where they were both working on their Divination homework.
